properties.description: This attractive four-bedroom semi-detached family home is conveniently located within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station, offering quick train services to London. The property is also within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes, and scenic National Trust woodland. The ground floor includes two spacious reception rooms, an 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room, a conservatory, a utility room, and a cloakroom. The first floor features four well-sized bedrooms, a family bathroom, and a separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating, and a beautifully presented interior. The property also boasts a well-kept garden, off-street parking, and a garage, making it an ideal family home.
properties.location: 109 Petts Wood Rd, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5 1JX, UK

properties.description: This two-bedroom garden house, located at 159 Poverest Rd, Orpington, offers a stylish and modern living space with a private courtyard garden. The property is presented in excellent decorative order, featuring a contemporary open-plan kitchen with integrated appliances and solid wooden flooring. Both bedrooms are generously sized doubles, while the family bathroom offers a three-piece suite with a shower attachment over the bath, complemented by a separate wet room for added convenience. The flat also benefits from walnut doors, Sky TV wiring in all rooms, double glazing, and a 10-year building guarantee.

This charming one-bedroom period terrace home is located at 5 Bruton Ave, Bath, offering a bright and well-presented interior. Positioned in the sought-after Bear Flat area, the property enjoys excellent access to local schools, shops, and services, with a short downhill stroll to the historic city center. Ideal for homeowners or investors, it also presents the potential for a loft conversion (subject to planning permission) for additional living space. The home combines convenient location with the opportunity to enhance and customize, making it a great choice for those seeking both charm and future potential.

This charming two-bedroom bungalow, located at 44, 11 Orwell Terrace, Edinburgh, offers a peaceful retreat in a quiet residential area. The property features a private garden and a garage, making it ideal for retirees or small families. With a spacious layout and modern conveniences, it ensures comfortable living. The bungalow is conveniently located near essential amenities, providing both tranquility and easy access to local services. Whether you're looking for a cozy home or a quiet retreat, this property offers a perfect balance of comfort and convenience.

This spacious four-bedroom terraced house is located at 12 Ibbetson Oval, Churwell, Morley, Leeds. It boasts a newly renovated kitchen and a large backyard, ideal for family living. The property is set in a friendly residential area, conveniently close to schools and parks, making it perfect for families seeking comfort and accessibility. The modern finishes and generous layout provide a welcoming environment for all. With a desirable location and excellent family-friendly features, this home offers both convenience and practicality.
properties.location: 12 Ibbetson Oval, Churwell, Morley, Leeds LS27 7RY, UK

properties.description: his charming two-bedroom split-level maisonette, situated in the heart of Godalming town, offers a beautifully presented living space with a modern kitchen and a spacious private terrace perfect for year-round relaxation or entertaining. Located near excellent transport links and local amenities, it is ideal for first-time buyers or investors seeking a stylish and convenient property.
properties.location: 9 Frith Hill Rd, Godalming GU7 2EF, UK

properties.description: This two-bedroom flat is located in the prestigious area of Turners Hill, Cheshunt, Waltham Cross. It features modern fittings throughout, offering a spacious living environment. The property comes with a private garden and a double garage, making it perfect for families seeking convenience and comfort. Situated in a sought-after area, this flat is close to local amenities and has excellent transport links, providing easy access to nearby areas while maintaining a peaceful and desirable setting.
properties.location: Turners Hill, Cheshunt, Waltham Cross EN8 9FD, UK
